name: Aero (anirranjan)
description:
Welcome to Aero, the ultimate arcade flying game! In Aero, you'll get to experience the thrill of piloting your own aircraft as you soar through beautiful, immersive environments. With intuitive controls and a variety of events to choose from, Aero is perfect for players of all skill levels. So why wait? Take to the skies in Aero today!

Controls:

  • W - Fly Up
  • S - Fly Down
  • A - Fly Left
  • D - Fly Right

Third Party Assets Used:

  • Lowpoly Environment Pack by K0RVEEN from the Unity Asset Store
  • Simple Water Shader URP by IGNITECODERS from the Unity Asset Store
  • S: Correct.mp3 by LittleRainySeasons -- https://freesound.org/s/335908/ -- License: Creative Commons 0
  • S: Double Prop plane by Mozfoo -- https://freesound.org/s/440164/ -- License: Creative Commons 0
  • S: tone beep.wav by pan14 -- https://freesound.org/s/263133/ -- License: Creative Commons 0
  • Monserrat Font from Google Fonts
  • TextMeshPro
  • Cinemachine
